name: plus-plug-spot-illuminator
description: Shelly MJS Script (https://shelly-api-docs.shelly.cloud/gen2/Scripts/ShellyScriptLanguageFeatures) for retrieving and indicating electricity spot prices in the LED of Shelly Plus Plug (S) using spot-hinta.fi and a dummy server for testing.
author: antti@shellykauppa.fi (Shellykauppa.fi / Kotia Finland Inc.)
